bf08ce71-7133-4d66-87a8-c63641e932bd.title: What's new in version 1.4.0
bf08ce71-7133-4d66-87a8-c63641e932bd.text:
Hashrate now supports Alephium through HeroMiners pool! This update also brings the following improvements:

• Flux support in HeroMiners
• Monero support in HeroMiners
• Interface improvements and bug fixes

You're currently in an outdated version, please update to version 1.4.0.
